channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Big Picture: How John Harbaugh Brought Credibility and Hope to Giants Overnight
item.description: The New York Giants reversed more than a decade of misfortune overnight when they hired John Harbaugh, the coach they desperately needed.

item.title: Arizona State Sun Devils vs. No. 1 Arizona Wildcats Highlights üèÄ FOX College Hoops
item.description: Check out the best moments from this showdown between the Arizona State Sun Devils vs the No. 1 Arizona Wildcats

item.title: Best Sports Betting Apps 2026: Top Betting Sites Reviewed
item.description: Compare the best sports betting apps and sites for 2026. See reviews, bonuses, and features to help choose the right sportsbook for your needs.

item.title: No. 4 Michigan Wolverines vs. Washington Huskies Highlights üèÄ FOX College Hoops
item.description: Check out the best moments from this showdown between the No. 4 Michigan Wolverines and the Washington Huskies!

item.title: Prosecutors Charge 15 Former NCAA Players in College Basketball Betting Scheme
item.description: Fifteen former college basketball players were among those charged by federal prosecutors in a game-fixing scandal.

item.title: Power Rankings: SEC shaping national title race
item.description: Texas beat South Carolina in a November nonconference game. Can the Gamecocks even the series?

item.title: Ranking the top 25 women's players midway through 2025-26
item.description: The midseason rankings include nine new names, including two freshman. Sarah Strong remains No. 1.

item.title: Power Rankings: How far Michigan, Iowa State, Vanderbilt drop after losses
item.description: Three of the five remaining unbeaten teams suffered their first losses and tumbled down the top 25.

item.title: Fastest skater, hardest shot, more: The Olympics' best at every skill
item.description: The rosters are set, the rink is (mostly) ready. Here are the key players to watch at the 2026 Games.

item.title: Nine teams that need to turn around their seasons -- now
item.description: From expected Final Four contenders like Kentucky and beyond, these teams have work to do in the final stretch.
